entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 04:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -14.5°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 8:26 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:26 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 8:26 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
